dashboard.title: Registration Dashboard
dashboard.choreographyDescription: Register your gymnastic routines and compositions
dashboard.coachDescription: Register certified coaches for your team
dashboard.judgeDescription: Register qualified judges for the tournament
dashboard.pendingRegistrationsMessage: pending registration ready for submission. Review your selections in the summary sidebar and submit when ready.
dashboard.pendingRegistrationsMessagePlural: pending registrations ready for submission. Review your selections in the summary sidebar and submit when ready.
dashboard.allRegistrationsMessage: All your registrations have been submitted and are now under review. Check the "View Submitted" tab to see your submitted registrations.
dashboard.noRegistrationsMessage: Start by registering at least one choreography, coach, or judge using the sections above.
dashboard.noRegistrationsSubmittedMessage: No registrations have been submitted to the database for this tournament yet.

coaches.title: Coach Registration
coaches.selectionDescription: Select coaches from {country} for tournament registration
coaches.selectionDescriptionFallback: Select a country first to view available coaches
coaches.selectCountryDescription: Choose your country from the dropdown above to view and select eligible coaches
coaches.additionalNotesDescription: Add any special requirements or notes for the coaching staff registration (optional)
coaches.notesPlaceholder: Enter any additional information about the coaches or special requirements...
coaches.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one coach to register.
coaches.registrationSuccessDescription: Successfully registered {count} coach(es) with PENDING status in the backend.
coaches.registrationErrorDescription: Failed to register coaches with backend. Please try again.

table.searchPlaceholder: Search coaches by name or level...

judges.title: Judge Registration
judges.selectionDescription: Select judges from {country} for tournament registration
judges.selectionDescriptionFallback: Select a country first to view available judges
judges.selectCountryDescription: Choose your country from the dropdown above to view and select eligible judges
judges.additionalNotesDescription: Add any special requirements or notes for the judging panel registration (optional)
judges.notesPlaceholder: Enter any additional information about the judges or special requirements...
judges.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one judge to register.
judges.registrationSuccessDescription: Successfully registered {count} judge(s) with PENDING status in the backend.
judges.registrationErrorDescription: Failed to register judges with backend. Please try again.

table.noJudgesFoundWithCategory: No judges with category {category} found for this country
table.noJudgesFoundGeneral: No judges found for this country

choreography.title: Choreography Registration
choreography.gymnastSelectionEmpty: Select gymnasts from {country} to automatically detect choreography details
choreography.categoryFilterNotice: üîí Category Filter Active: Only showing {category} gymnasts. All gymnasts in a choreography must be from the same category.
choreography.invalidCountWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è {count} gymnasts is not a valid count for competition. Valid counts are: 1, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gymnasts.
choreography.basicInformationDescription: Basic details are automatically detected from your selected gymnasts
choreography.autoDetectedFromCount: ‚úì Auto-detected from gymnast count and gender
choreography.invalidCountMessage: Select 1, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gymnasts to enable registration
choreography.invalidCountDetails: Valid counts: 1, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gymnasts. Continue to {next} or go back to {prev}.
choreography.registrationSuccessDescription: Your choreography has been registered with PENDING status in the backend.
choreography.registrationFailedDescription: Some gymnasts have missing FIG IDs. Try refreshing the gymnast data in the selection table.
choreography.choreographyRegisteredMessage: Choreography successfully registered in PENDING status!

table.failedToLoad: Failed to load gymnasts from FIG database
